item.title: Can The Big Amazon Kindle DX Save The Newspapers?
item.description:
The recent debut of the larger Amazon Kindle DX has been hailed by some as a potential savior for the struggling newspaper industry. However, this nearly $500 device, while innovative, is unlikely to reverse the decline of print newspapers. It’s simply too late and too expensive a solution for an industry facing dire financial straits. Had newspapers embraced electronic delivery methods a decade ago, the outcome might have been different. Now, many are on the brink of collapse, and technology alone cannot salvage them...
